name: Uplifted
description:
Lead an anxious adventurer on a wholesome journey as she steps out of her comfort zone, and learns to trust the unknown.

Following a hot air balloon crash, our adventurer must search a dark, unfamiliar landscape to find the pieces of her aircraft, rebuild it, and carry on her journey.

[Note if your background appears greyed out please just refresh the page and it should be back to normal!]

Explore the island using wasd or arrow keys to collect the lost parts of your hot air balloon! You will also come across other collectables on the way. All of these appear in the interactable inventory on the right-hand side of your sceen.

Once you have collected all of the parts for your hot air balloon your chariot to the sky awaits! 

Happy Adventuring!
